definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通過專項整治，再現京城水系和古典園林的歷史風貌。

sentences.english: Changle over mountain rivers flowing through hilly, water development, water rich.
sentences.chinese: 長樂以上，河流經丘陵山區，水系發育，水量豐富。

sentences.english: Drainage was to the north and individual channels bifurcate in that direction .
sentences.chinese: 整個水系向北排水，各個河道朝該方向分叉。

sentences.english: The man-made water system wanders 7 kilometers long, reaching every corner of the scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒七公里長的人工水系四通八達環繞着整個景區。

sentences.english: It is a good thing that this park has excellent drainage.
sentences.chinese: 這個公園的排水系統很好是件好事。

sentences.english: Someone tried to poison the water supply.
sentences.chinese: 有人企圖在供水系統裏放毒。

sentences.english: In this paper the network flow theory is used to research the optimal control of water distribution of city.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用網絡流理論，研究城市配水系統的優化控制。

sentences.english: The product has excellent scale-inhibition performance in high alkaline and solid water system.
sentences.chinese: 產品在高鹼度高固水系具有優異的阻垢性能。

sentences.english: The slope debris flows may be controlled by construction of drainage systems and reforestation.
sentences.chinese: 建排水系統和發育植被可以最終控制坡面泥石流。

sentences.english: Yi River Basin is located in high precipitation area and the river system is asymmetric.
sentences.chinese: 沂河流域地處降雨高值區，水系呈不對稱特徵。

sentences.english: In addition to the standard systems, this product line also provides sound-absorbing drainpipes that meet the most demanding requirements.
sentences.chinese: 除了標準排水系統，吉博力還提供靜音排水管道。

sentences.english: Taihu basin belongs to plain river network and river systems are connected with each other.
sentences.chinese: 太湖流域屬於平原河網區，水系相五連通。

sentences.english: Miluo River in the east of Dongting Lake, the Dongting Lake water system.
sentences.chinese: 汨羅江在洞庭湖東側，屬洞庭湖水系。

sentences.english: Airborne mercury can change into a highly toxic form after falling into waterways.
sentences.chinese: 如果空氣當中的汞進入到水系中，會產生劇毒。

sentences.english: Water diverted from the Luanhe River to Tangshan is a main water source of the Caofeidian Industry Zone.
sentences.chinese: 唐山市引灤供水系統是曹妃甸工業區的主水源。

sentences.english: The waters of Lijiang remain the one constant in the ever-evolving universe of the Naxi.
sentences.chinese: 麗江水系是不斷髮展的納西世界裏惟一不變的元素。

definition: geographical position according to the principles of feng shui 風水|风水[feng1 shui3]/ley lines
inland river/river draining to inland sea
